app.title: Vehicore
login.title: Sign in to your account
login.subtitle: Enter your email and password to continue
signup.title: Create an account
signup.subtitle: Enter your information to get started
signup.passwordHint: Password must be at least 8 characters and include uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character
signup.checkEmailSubtitle: We've sent you a confirmation link
signup.checkEmailBody: Please check your email inbox and click the confirmation link to verify your account. You'll be able to sign in after confirming your email.
forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password
forgotPassword.checkEmailSubtitle: We've sent you a password reset link
forgotPassword.checkEmailBody: If an account exists with this email, you'll receive a password reset link shortly.
resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password below
resetPassword.passwordHint: Password must be at least 8 characters and include uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character
resetPassword.successBody: You can now sign in with your new password.
confirmEmail.successSubtitle: Your email has been successfully verified
confirmEmail.successBody: You can now sign in to your account.
confirmEmail.errorSubtitle: We couldn't confirm your email address
settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account settings
settings.name: Name
settings.passwordSubtitle: Update your password to keep your account secure
settings.passwordHint: Password must be at least 8 characters and include uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character
settings.passwordUpdatedDescription: Your password has been changed successfully.
billing.title: Billing
billing.subtitle: Purchase credits for your API keys
billing.selectApiKeySubtitle: Choose which API key to attach the purchased package to, or create a new one
billing.creditPackagesSubtitle: Select a package to add credits to your selected API key.
billing.purchasesSubtitle: History of packages purchased for your API keys
billing.selectApiKeyError: Please select an API key first
billing.selectApiKeyErrorDescription: Please choose an API key before purchasing a package.
billing.checkoutErrorDefault: Unable to create checkout session. Please try again.
apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.subtitle: Manage your API keys for accessing the Vehicore API
apiKeys.createdSubtitle: Make sure to copy your API key now. You won't be able to see it again.
apiKeys.empty: No API keys found. Create one to get started.
apiKeys.table.name: Name
apiKeys.dialog.title: Create API Key
apiKeys.dialog.description: Create a new API key to access the Vehicore API. Give it a descriptive name to help you identify it later.
apiKeys.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this API key? This action cannot be undone.
apiKeys.deleteSuccessDescription: The API key was deleted successfully.
usage.title: Usage
usage.subtitle: Your API keys, credits, and purchases
usage.overviewSubtitle: Filter by key and date range
dashboardOnboarding.title: Get started with VehiCore AI
dashboardOnboarding.subtitle: Follow these steps to set up your API key and make your first request.
dashboardOnboarding.step1Body: This key was automatically generated for you. Copy it and store it securely. You can retrieve or create new keys anytime from the API keys page.
dashboardOnboarding.step1MissingBody: Your API key exists, but it can't be shown right now. Create a new key on the API Keys page if needed.
dashboardOnboarding.step2Body: Add this key to your .env or create the file if it doesn't exist. For security, we recommend using environment variables in production.
dashboardOnboarding.step3Body: Send your API key as an X-API-Key header on every request to VehiCore AI endpoints.
dashboardOnboarding.step4Body: Your API key authenticates your requests and tracks your usage. You start with a free tier that includes credits for testing. Once you've used your key at least once, we'll redirect you to the Usage page by default.
dashboardOnboarding.freeTierBody: Your API key gives you access to a free tier with credits to get started. You can purchase additional credits from the Billing page.
